description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for health check endpoints, including a comprehensive '/healthz' endpoint with dependency checks (e.g., Supabase connectivity and memory usage) and a simple '/health' liveness probe.

methods.name: GET /healthz
methods.description: Endpoint that performs health checks including database connectivity and memory usage, returning a JSON object with status, timestamp, and other metrics.

methods.name: GET /health
methods.description: Simple liveness endpoint returning basic service status with timestamp and uptime.
